00001 //-*-C++-*-
00002 #ifndef __EpetraEPResult_h__
00003 #define __EpetraEPResult_h__
00004 #include "EPResult.h"
00005 
00006 // Epetra Headers
00007 #include "Epetra_ConfigDefs.h"
00008 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
00009 #include "mpi.h"
00010 #include "Epetra_MpiComm.h"
00011 #else
00012 #include "Epetra_SerialComm.h"
00013 #endif
00014 #include "Epetra_Vector.h"
00015 #include "Epetra_FECrsMatrix.h"
00016 
00017 namespace voom {
00018   struct EpetraEPResult: public EPResult{
00020     EpetraEPResult(Epetra_MpiComm* comm,
00021            const vector<int> & localDoF,
00022            const vector<int> & ghostDoF): 
00023       _localDoFNum(localDoF.size()), _ghostDoFNum(ghostDoF.size()),
00024       _localDoF(localDoF), _ghostDoF(ghostDoF)
00025     {
00026       // Create target and sourcemaps
00027       _targetMap = new Epetra_Map(-1, localDoF.size(), &localDoF[0], 0, *comm);
00028       _sourceMap = new Epetra_Map(-1, ghostDoF.size(), &ghostDoF[0], 0, *comm);
00029       
00030       // Create Epetra vector and Crs matrices
00031       _diffusionRV       = new Epetra_Vector(*_targetMap);
00032       _ghostDiffusionRV  = new Epetra_Vector(*_sourceMap);
00033       _ionicCurrent      = new Epetra_Vector(*_targetMap);
00034       _ghostIonicCurrent = new Epetra_Vector(*_sourceMap);
00035       _diffusionLHS      = new Epetra_FECrsMatrix(Copy, *_targetMap, 10);
00036       _diffusionRHS      = new Epetra_FECrsMatrix(Copy, *_targetMap, 10);
00037       _ionicLHS          = new Epetra_FECrsMatrix(Copy, *_targetMap, 10);
00038       _ionicRHS          = new Epetra_FECrsMatrix(Copy, *_targetMap, 10);
00039       
00040       _ionicCurrent->ExtractView(&_extractedIonicCurrent);
00041       _ghostIonicCurrent->ExtractView(&_extractedGhostIonicCurrent);
00042     };
00043     
00045     ~EpetraEPResult() {
00046       delete _targetMap;
00047       delete _sourceMap;
00048       delete _diffusionRV;       delete _ghostDiffusionRV;
00049       delete _ionicCurrent;      delete _ghostIonicCurrent;
00050       delete _diffusionLHS;      delete _diffusionRHS;
00051       delete _ionicLHS;          delete _ionicRHS;
00052     };
00053 
00054     // The same Epetra maps are used from Solver to create the solution vector
00055     Epetra_Map * getTargetMap() {return _targetMap; };
00056     Epetra_Map * getSourceMap() {return _sourceMap; };
00057 
00060     void addIonicCurrent(const int localIndex, const Real value) {
00061       if ( localIndex < _localDoFNum ) 
00062     _extractedIonicCurrent[localIndex] += value;
00063       else
00064     _extractGhostIonicCurrent[localIndex - localDoFNum] += value;
00065     }
00066     
00068     void addDiffusionLHSMatrix(const int localRow, const int localCol,
00069                    const Real value) {
00070       _addToMatrix(_diffusionLHS, localRow, localCol, value);
00071     }
00072 
00074     void addDiffusionRHSMatrix(const int localRow, const int localCol,
00075                    const Real value) {
00076       _addToMatrix(_diffusionRHS, localRow, localCol, value);
00077     }
00078 
00080     void addIonicLHSMatrix(const int localRow, const int localCol,
00081                const Real value) {
00082       _addToMatrix(_ionicLHS, localRow, localCol, value);
00083     }
00084 
00086     void addIonicRHSMatrix(const int localRow, const int localCol,
00087                const Real value) {
00088       _addToMatrix(_ionicRHS, localRow, localCol, value);
00089     }
00090 
00092     void finalizeMatrixAssembly() {
00093       _diffusionLHS->GlobalAssemble();
00094       _diffusionRHS->GlobalAssemble();
00095       _ionicLHS->GlobalAssemble();
00096       _ionicRHS->GlobalAssemble();
00097     }
00098 
00099   private:
00100     
00101     uint _localDoFNum;
00102     uint _ghostDoFNum;
00103     const vector<int> & _localDoF;
00104     const vector<int> & _ghostDoF;
00105 
00106     Epetra_Map * _targetMap;
00107     Epetra_Map * _sourceMap;
00108     
00109     // Intermediate RHS(b in Ax=b) for Diffusion equation solve
00110     Epetra_Vector * _diffusionRV;
00111     Epetra_Vector * _ghostDiffusionRV;
00112 
00113     // Ionic currents
00114     Epetra_Vector* _ionicCurrent;
00115     Real* _extractedIonicCurrent;
00116     Epetra_Vector* _ghostIonicCurrent;
00117     Real* _extractedGhostIonicCurrent;
00118 
00119     Epetra_FECrsMatrix* _diffusionLHS;
00120     Epetra_FECrsMatrix* _diffusionRHS;
00121     Epetra_FECrsMatrix* _ionicLHS;
00122     Epetra_FECrsMatrix* _ionicRHS;
00123 
00125     void _addToMatrix(Epetra_FECrsMatrix* const A, const int localRow,
00126               const int localCol, const Real value) {
00127       int GlobalRow = 0;
00128       int GlobalCol = 0;
00129       
00130       if ( localRow < _localDoFNum ) GlobalRow = _localDoF[localRow]; 
00131       else GlobalRow = _ghostDoF[localRow]; 
00132     
00133       if ( localCol < _localDoFNum ) GlobalCol = _localDoF[localCol]; 
00134       else GlobalCol = _ghostDoF[localCol]; 
00135       
00136       A->InsertGlobalValues(1, &GlobalRow, 1, &GlobalCol, &value);
00137     }
00138   };
00139 }
00140 #endif
